column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to Wordsworth''' on his Merton College
column3: Oxford stationary. <ref name=>[http://www.tolkienlibrary.com/tolkien-book-store/000332.htm Wordsworth note] at [http://www.tolkienlibrary.com/ Tolkien Library] (accessed 07 September 2014)</ref>

column1: I shall be in my room (Fellows 4) from 7 p.m. onwards.  I cannot guarantee any entertainment
column2: but it will be delightful to see you again.  Yours  J.R.R. T.'

column1: In an annotation by the recipient
column2: he notes in reference to the indicated time of 12:45 am
column5: that he should write even before going to bed!'
